mapper.select: select order_date, order_no, status_code from customer_order where cust_id=#{cust_id}
mapper.update: update customer_order set status_code=4 where order_no=#{order_no}
mapper.select: select month,sum(total) from (select substr(order_date,4,2) month,total from customer_order o,(select order_no,sum(detail_price*detail_cnt) total from customerorder_detail group by order_no) s where o.order_no = s.order_no) group by month
